item.title: Voter Tune-Up: Charting the Emmy Nominees in the Music Races
item.description: This year’s Emmy music races are chock-full of first-timers, surprising choices and maddening statistics. For example: Thomas and Julia Newman, who scored “Monsters: The Lyle and Erik Mene
